title: The Chair of Trust - Signs of Human Trafficking

content.scenario: A client sits in your chair. She seems nervous, avoids eye contact, and has bruises she dismisses as 'clumsiness.' She checks her phone frequently, looking anxious whenever it buzzes.
content.connection: As a cosmetology professional, you are uniquely positioned to observe warning signs. The salon chair creates a rare moment of trust and intimacy where victims may feel safe enough to reveal their situation.
content.law: Texas law requires cosmetology professionals to complete training on recognizing warning signs of human trafficking. Being aware of these signs can save lives.
